title: An Act establishing a commission to study the availability of the continuum of care services for persons with substance use disorder

abstracts.abstract: By Representative John Francis Moran of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2226) of John Francis Moran and Carmine Lawrence Gentile for legislation to establish a special commission (including members of the General Court) to study the availability of the continuum of care services for persons with substance use disorder.  Mental Health, Substance Use and Recovery.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Mental Health, Substance Use and Recovery

related_entities.name: committee on Mental Health, Substance Use and Recovery

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Accompanied a new draft, see H4669
